title: Moss Giant Island

properties.name: description
properties.value: Moss Giant Island is a small island located west of Brimhaven. The island has five moss giants, and requires 10 Agility to access it using the ropeswing (Rope not required). The island offers very good safespots to kill moss giants. Beware of the Poison Scorpions near the island.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Moss Giant Island
Moss Giant Island
Released12 December 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationSouthern Sea, Karamja
InhabitantsMoss giants
TeleportsNone
Map
Advanced data
Typeisland

Moss Giant Island is a small island located west of Brimhaven. The island has five moss giants, and requires 10 Agility to access it using the ropeswing (Rope not required). The island offers very good safespots to kill moss giants. Beware of the Poison Scorpions near the island.

There are two slice of cake spawns, which have a respawn time of 45 seconds. Players with 40+ Defence do not need to bring much food because of this resource.

Players can safespot the moss giants by using the south shore and middle between the trees north of the island.

'''Moss Giant Island''' is a small island located west of [[Brimhaven]]. The island has five [[moss giant]]s, and requires 10 [[Agility]] to access it using the ropeswing ([[Rope]] not required). The island offers very good [[safespot]]s to kill moss giants. Beware of the [[Poison Scorpion]]s near the island.

There are two [[slice of cake]] [[Spawning|spawns]], which have a respawn time of 45 seconds. Players with 40+ [[Defence]] do not need to bring much [[food]] because of this resource.

Players can safespot the moss giants by using the south shore and middle between the trees north of the island.
